page.title: 07Royal Victoria Cemetery.
page.content: Behind the{Royal Victoria Country {Park}at{Netley}there is a{military {cemetery}which is well kept but unused.There are lines of memorials to those who died in the two world wars but there are some remembering earlier battles. All this is a sad reminder that the human race never seems to learn from it's mistakes.Some are family graves from an era when smallpox was a killer.We noticed that many men had returned from outposts of the empire only to die at Netley.There are also some German crosses from the first world war.
